name: Grim Reaper (geekairbus)
description:
Grim Reaper is our first year final project at creajeux.

You take the control of Grim, a Reaper, who fight for the balance of the world in this action/plateform games, prepare to fight some monster, upgrade you scythe with skills or insert and save the kingdom !

Crimson Scythe Studio :

dev:

Gregoire Lebas

Raphael Jocteur

Nicolas Junquera

Patrick Baudry

Alexandre Huchet

Graph:
